By the King. A proclamation to restrain the abuses of hackney coaches in the cities of London, and Westminster, and the suburbs thereof England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II) Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.
1 sheet ([1] p.)
Printed by John Bill and Christopher Barker, Printers to the Kings most Excellent Majesty, London : 1660.
Dated at end: Given at Our Court at Whitehall the eighteenth day of October, in the twelfth year of Our Reign. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
